---
title: Process compensation controls fcs files into flowSet.
author: Dillon Hammill
date: June 6, 2022
output_format: html_document
---
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(CytoExploreR)
library(gtools)

# FILES
files <- mixedsort(
  list.files(
    system.file(
      "extdata/Compensation", 
      package = "CytoExploreRData"
    ), 
    full.names = TRUE
  )
)

# FLOWSET
Compensation <- read.flowSet(files)

# MARKERS
chnls <- c("Alexa Fluor 405-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 430-A",
          "APC-Cy7-A", "PE-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 488-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 700-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 647-A",
          "7-AAD-A")
markers <- c("Hoechst-405",
            "Hoechst-430",
            "CD11c",
            "Va2",
            "CD8",
            "CD4",
            "CD44",
            "CD69")
names(markers) <- chnls
markernames(Compensation) <- markers

# EVENT BARCODES
Compensation <- cyto_barcode(
  Compensation,
  "events"
)

# FLOWSET
Compensation <- flowWorkspace::cytoset_to_flowSet(Compensation)
```
